title: [ENH] Prophet fitting should be by default non-verbose
body:
When running `fit` of `fbprophet.Prophet` (the `sktime` adapter) with default parameters, following output is generated:

```
Initial log joint probability = -52.8485
Iteration  1. Log joint probability =    45.5064. Improved by 98.3549.
Iteration  2. Log joint probability =    58.4846. Improved by 12.9782.
Iteration  3. Log joint probability =    59.1316. Improved by 0.647006.
Iteration  4. Log joint probability =     59.147. Improved by 0.0154346.
Iteration  5. Log joint probability =     59.147. Improved by 2.3214e-005.
Iteration  6. Log joint probability =     59.147. Improved by 1.05452e-006.
Iteration  7. Log joint probability =    59.1471. Improved by 7.16411e-006.
Iteration  8. Log joint probability =    59.1511. Improved by 0.00408052.
Iteration  9. Log joint probability =    59.1511. Improved by 3.5126e-006.
Iteration 10. Log joint probability =    59.1511. Improved by 2.28879e-007.
Iteration 11. Log joint probability =    59.1511. Improved by 5.03879e-009.
```

However, the default should be non-verbose (with an option to turn this on).
